sentences.en: As defined from an existentialist perspective, our lives are defined by the choices we make.
sentences.cn: 从存在主义的观点来定义，我们的生活就是我们做出的选择。

sentences.en: Camus, an existentialist writer, express by l absurd his thought about the meaning of human existence.
sentences.cn: 存在主义作家伽缪在其《西西弗的神话》中通过“背谬”概念表达了对于人的存在意义的反思.

sentences.en: Existentialist points of view cause us to reflect and rationally examine existence and its meanings.
sentences.cn: 由此引发我们对生命存在与意义的认真反省与理性审思.

sentences.en: The existentialist thinks it very distressing that God does not exist.
sentences.cn: 存在主义者认为这是非常苦恼的,即上帝不存在.

words.tran_cn: 存在主义的；有关存在的；存在判断的
存在，实在；生存，生活；存在物，实在物

trans.tran_en: If you describe a person or their philosophy as existentialist, you mean that their beliefs are based on existentialism
An existentialist is a person who agrees with the philosophy of existentialism
